data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Taylor, Robert W. (2009): Ants of the genus Lordomyrma Emery (1) Generic synonymy, composition and distribution, with notes on Ancyridris Wheeler and Cyphoidris Weber (Hymenoptera: Formicidae: Myrmicinae). Zootaxa 1979: 16-28, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.274639
